isosensitivity: Auto (100-3200), 100-6400 (in 1/3-stop or whole stop increments) ISO can be expanded to H: 12800
screenfeatures: - Resolution: 920,000 dots - 160° angle viewing - Adjustable brightness - Approx. 100% frame coverage - Anti-reflection coating
effects: Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined (x3)
shutterspeed: 30-1/8000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
exposuremodes: Auto (Stills and Movie), Creative Auto, Program AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual (Stills and Movie), Custom (x3)
whitebalance: AWB, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten, White Fluorescent light, Flash, Custom, Colour Temperature Setting. White balance compensation: 1. Blue/Amber +/-9 2. Magenta/ Green +/-9
cleaning: EOS integrated cleaning system with fluorine coating
